body.p: Comedi and comedilib can be checked out using anonymous CVS using the commands:
body.pre: cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@cvs.comedi.org:/var/cvs login cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@cvs.comedi.org:/var/cvs co comedi cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@cvs.comedi.org:/var/cvs co comedilib
body.p: When prompted for a password, hit enter.
